items.title: CM Approves Jaipur Metro Phase-II DPR
items.excerpt: Bhajanlal Sharma clears DPR for 42.8 km Metro Phase-II from Todi Mode to Prahladpura.
items.contentHtml:
Metro Expansion in Jaipur

Chief Minister Bhajanlal Sharma approved the Detailed Project Report (DPR) for Jaipur Metro Phase-II. The project spans 42.8 km from Todi Mode to Prahladpura, with 36 stations including elevated and underground ones. It will significantly improve Jaipur’s urban connectivity.

items.title: CM Flags Off 162 New RSRTC Buses
items.excerpt: CM launched new luxury & AC buses from Jaipur, including Kainchi Dham service.
items.contentHtml:
Public Transport Boost

CM Bhajanlal Sharma flagged off 162 RSRTC buses from Jaipur, including luxury and AC coaches. These services include a special Jaipur–Kainchi Dham route, enhancing comfort and connectivity for citizens and pilgrims.

items.title: Jaipur Gets 2 Lakh LED Streetlights
items.excerpt: CM launches campaign to install 200,000 LED streetlights in Jaipur under City Chalo drive.
items.contentHtml:
City Chalo Campaign

Ahead of the festive season, the Rajasthan government under CM Bhajanlal Sharma announced the installation of 2 lakh LED streetlights across Jaipur. A new helpline (181) was also launched for citizen feedback on civic services.

items.title: CM Announces Panel for Spice Producers
items.excerpt: A special committee to give Jaipur spice producers a global platform.
items.contentHtml:
Empowering Spice Industry

CM Bhajanlal Sharma announced a new panel to support Rajasthan spice producers with GI tags and export guidance. The state will also host a Global Rajasthan Agritech Meet to provide international exposure to Jaipur’s agri-business sector.
